title: Griefing support taking cs and trolling
body: Hey this player who was playing {{champion:34}} in champ select wanted adc and i didnt give it to him. so he decided to take my minions on purpose and ice wall me. Is this bannable?

replies.body: won't be picked up by riots dogshit report system.

you dont hold it you dont own it mfr - chriss duanne 

god forbid something as bannable as property rights invade "ur" safespace
Just report him, it happens everywhere in the game.{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
Taking cs isn't punishable, since it's not really yours. Is ideal? I personally don't think so. As for the ice-walling you, I'd report that as griefing with a note about what the Anivia was doing.
